item.title: Entangle & TB problem
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

if(spellID == 1592) // entangle (lvl 79 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 78) { stillgfx(179, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); castOnPlayer.entangle(); inCombat(); startAnimation(711); PkingDelay = 40; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; castOnPlayer.sendMessage("Entangle has been cast upon you!"); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 78) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 79 to cast this spell."); } }

And the other:

if(spellID == 1592) // entangle (lvl 79 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 78) { stillgfx(179, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.entangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); startAnimation(711); PkingDelay = 40; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; castOnPlayer.sendMessage("Entangle has been cast upon you!"); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 78) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 79 to cast this spell."); } }

Duno?

Read full topic

item.title: Entangle & TB problem
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

else if(spellID == 12445) // teleblock (lvl 85 spell)
if(playerLevel[6] >= 85)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(562, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(563, 1)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(562, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(563, 1)==true))
{
startAnimation(1819);
castOnPlayer.Teleblock();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(345, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 1); 
deleteItem(562, getItemSlot(562), 1); 
deleteItem(563, getItemSlot(563), 1); 
PkingDelay = 10;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 85)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 85 to cast this spell.");
}
}
if(spellID == 1592) // entangle (lvl 79 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 78)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 8)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(557, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 10)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
sendMessage("You need 8 "+getItemName(561)+", 10 "+getItemName(557)+" and 10 "+getItemName(555));
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 8)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(557, 10)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 10)==true))
{
stillgfx(179, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.entangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
startAnimation(711);
PkingDelay = 40;
deleteItem(561, getItemSlot(561), 8); 
deleteItem(557, getItemSlot(557), 10); 
deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 10); 
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
castOnPlayer.sendMessage("A bind spell has been cast upon you!");
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 78)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 79 to cast this spell.");
}
}

Ofcourse i’ve got those
Still i don’t understand why they don’t work

Read full topic

item.title: Entangle & TB problem
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

Before i tell you how to fix, you should know that magicID is on npcs, and spellID is on players
Here is the IDs so you can look at what its doing
for tb search if(spellID == 12445)
for tangle search if(spellID == 1592)
then make em work, using pk voids in pimpscape

Read full topic
